Key.English: $%1 Received for the neutralization assistance of a %2.
Key.French: $%1 Gagné pour l'assistance à la neutralisation d'un %2.
Key.German: Für die Kampfunterstützung gegen %2 hast du $%1 erhalten.
Key.Russian: $%1 Received for the neutralization assistance of a %2.
Key.Italian: $%1 Received for the neutralization assistance of a %2.

Key.English: Our team has captured a camp at %1.
Key.French: Un campement a été capturé à %1.
Key.German: Unser Team hat ein Camp bei %1 eingenommen.
Key.Italian: Il nostro fazione ha catturato un campo a %1.

Key.English: Your Squad has captured a camp at %1. $%2 earned.
Key.French: Votre équipe à capturé un campement à %1. Vous gagné $%2.
Key.German: Dein Squad hat ein Camp bei %1 eingenommen. Du erhälst $%2.
Key.Italian: Il tuo Squad ha catturato un campo a %1. $%2 Guadagnati.

Key.French: Vous avez reçu $%1 de la part de %2.

Key.English: You were deducted from $%1 due to your gear
Key.French: Vous avez été déduit de $%1 en raison de votre équipement
Key.German: Dir werden $%1 für neue Ausrüstung abgezogen
Key.Russian: У вас изъято $%1 за ваше снаряжение
Key.Italian: You were deducted from $%1 due to your gear

Key.English: WARNNING! An Intercontinental ballistic missile launch has been detected!
Key.French: ATTENTION! Le lancement d'un Missile balistique intercontinental a été detecté!
Key.German: WARNUNG! Der Abschuss einer Interkontinentalrakete wurde gemeldet!
Key.Italian: ATTENZIONE! Un Missile Balistico intercontinentale è stato avvistato!

Key.French: Déploiement de l'écran de fumée IR! %1 munitions restantes.

Key.English: $%1 Lost for a civilian neutralization! Go to the ophthalmologist...
Key.French: $%1 Perdu pour la neutralisation d'un civil! soyer prudent!
Key.German: $%1 Strafe für die Tötung eines Zivilisten! Ab zum Augenarzt...
Key.Russian: $%1 Потерянно за убийство гражданского! будьте осторожны!
Key.Italian: $%1 Perduti per aver neutralizzato un civile! stai attento!

Key.English: You are the new Commander! Good luck!
Key.French: Vous êtes le Commandeur! Bonne Chance!
Key.German: Du bist der neue Commander! Viel Erfolg!

Key.French: >Une structure de type "%1" à été vendu!

Key.English: A "%1" structure is going to be sold in %2 seconds!
Key.French: Une structure de type "%1" va être vendu dans %2 secondes!
Key.German: Das Gebäude "%1" wird in %2 Sekunden verkauft!
Key.Russian: A "%1" structure is going to be sold in %2 seconds!
Key.Italian: A "%1" structure is going to be sold in %2 seconds!

Key.English: Your Squad has been awarded with %1%2 for the completion of a secondary objective.
Key.French: Votre équipe à reçu %1%2 pour avoir completé un objectif secondaire.
Key.German: Dein Squad wurde für den erfolgreichen Abschluss einer Nebenmission mit %1%2 belohnt.
Key.Russian: Your Squad has been awarded with %1%2 for the completion of a secondary objective.
Key.Italian: Your Squad has been awarded with %1%2 for the completion of a secondary objective.

Key.French: Vous avez reçu $%1 pour le recyclage d'un %2.
Key.Italian: $%1 Ricevuti recuperando i pezzi di un %2

Key.French: Votre équipe à capturé %1. Vous gagné $%2.
Key.German: Dein Squad hat %1 eingenommen. Du hast $%2 verdient.
Key.Italian: Il tuo Squad ha conquistato %1. $%2 Guadagnati.

Key.English: Your squad has assisted in capturing %1. $%2 earned.
Key.French: Votre équipe à aidé à la capture de %1. Vous gagné $%2.
Key.German: Dein Squad gab Unterstützung beim Einnehmen von %1. $%2 verdient.
Key.Italian: Il tuo Squad ha assistito alla cattura di %1. $%2 Guadagnati.

Key.English: Player %1 (ID: %2) freaks out and rioted in Base (%3 has been destroyed)!
Key.French: Player %1 (ID: %2) freaks out and rioted in Base (%3 has been destroyed)!
Key.German: Der Spieler %1 (ID: %2) dreht hohl und randaliert in der Basis (%3 wurde bereits zerstört)!
Key.Russian: Player %1 (ID: %2) freaks out and rioted in Base (%3 has been destroyed)!
Key.Italian: Player %1 (ID: %2) freaks out and rioted in Base (%3 has been destroyed)!

Key.French: Le joueur %1 (ID: %2) a changé d'équipe! (De %3 à %4)
Key.German: Der Spieler %1 (ID: %2) hat das Team gewechselt! (von %3 nach %4)
Key.Italian: Il Giocatore %1 (ID: %2) ha cambiato squadra! (da %3 a %4)

Key.English: $%1 removed for a teamkill! go to the ophthalmologist...
Key.German: $%1 Strafe für einen Teamkill! Ab zum Augenarzt...

Key.English: Your commander has ordered you to perform a "%1" order for %2!
Key.French: Votre commandeur vous a donner l'ordre "%1" pour une durée de %2!
Key.German: Dein Commander hat dir befohlen, einen "%1"-Befehl für %2 durchzuführen!
Key.Italian: Il tuo comandante ti ha ordinato di "%1" per una durata di %2!

Key.English: You will be sent back to the lobby for teamswapping. Please join your original team!
Key.French: Vous allez être renvoyé vers l'écran de séléction des rôles pour avoir changé d'équipe. Veuillez rejoindre votre équipe d'origine!
Key.German: Ein Teamwechsel ist nicht erlaubt. Bitte join dein ursprüngliches Team!
Key.Russian: Вы будете возвращены в лобби за смену команды. Пожалуйста вернитесь в вашу команду!
Key.Italian: You will be sent back to the lobby for teamswapping. Please join your original team!

Key.English: %1 Upgrade completed, %1 is now at Level %2.
Key.French: Amélioration %1 Complète, %1 est désormais au Niveau %2.
Key.German: %1 wurde ausgebaut und hat jetzt Stufe %2 erreicht.
Key.Italian: Aggiornamento %1 Completato, %1 è ora a Livello %2.

Key.French: %1 a débuté un vote de commandant.

Key.English: Send the order to the squad
Information:\n\n You may not use the quick reload function since you don't have any custom gear, you need to purchase a loadout first.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Vous ne pouvez pas utiliser la fonction de rechargement rapide puisque vous n'avez pas d'équipement personnalisé, acheter-en un en premier.
Key.German: Information:\n\n You may not use the quick reload function since you don't have any custom gear, you need to purchase a loadout first.
Key.Russian: Information:\n\n You may not use the quick reload function since you don't have any custom gear, you need to purchase a loadout first.
Key.Italian: Information:\n\n You may not use the quick reload function since you don't have any custom gear, you need to purchase a loadout first.

Key.English: Information:\n\n You've reached the bases area limit, you can sell old buildings or build in an existing base area.
Key.French: Information:\n\n La limite de bases est atteinte, il est possible de vendre des vieilles structures ou de construire dans une base existante.
Key.German: Information:\n\n Die maximal erlaubte Anzahl an HQs wurde erreicht. Du kannst entweder alte Gebäude verkaufen oder in einer bereits bestehenden Base weiterbauen.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Количество районов для баз достигло предела, вы можете продать старые здания, или построить в районе существующей базы.
Key.Italian: Informazioni:\n\n Hai raggiunto il limite di aree basi, puoi vendere le vecchie costruzioni o costruire in un area base esistente.

Key.English:
Information:

Infantry may not be purchased while camps in the city are held by the enemy.
Key.French:
Information:

Il est impossible d'acheter de l'infantrie tant que l'ennemi détient un ou plusieurs camps.
Key.German:
Information:

Infantry may not be purchased while camps in the city are held by the enemy.
Key.Russian:
Информация:

Infantry may not be purchased while camps in the city are held by the enemy.
Key.Italian:
Informazioni:

Infantry may not be purchased while camps in the city are held by the enemy.

Key.English: Information:\n\n Manned Vehicles cannot be hooked. Make sure that the vehicle is empty.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Les véhicules avec équipage ne peuvent être accrochées. Assurez-vous que le véhicule est vide.
Key.German: Information:\n\n Es können nur unbemannte Fahrzeuge an den Haken genommen werden. Versichere dich, dass das Fahrzeug leer ist und versuche es noch einmal.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Техника с юнитами не может перевозиться. Убедись что техника пуста.
Key.Italian: Informazioni:\n\n I veicoli con a bordo personale non possono essere agganciati, assicurati che sia vuoto.

Key.English: Information:\n\n You've failed to unlock the vehicle.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Vous n'avez pas réussi à déverouiller le véhicule.
Key.German:
Information:

 Der Versuch, das Fahrzeug mit einem Dietrich zu öffnen ist fehlgeschlagen.

 Scheint, als wurde der Dietrich im Baumarkt gekauft, versuche es weiter.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Вам не удалось открыть транспорт отмычкой.
Key.Italian: Informazioni:\n\n Non sei riuscito ad aprire il veicolo.

Key.English: Information:\n\n The vehicle has been successfully unlocked.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Le véhicule à été déverouillé avec succès.
Key.German: Information:\n\n Du hast das Fahrzeug mittels einem Dietrich erfolgreich geöffnet.
Key.Italian: Informazioni:\n\n Sei riuscito ad aprire il veicolo.

Key.English: Information:\n\n You cannot take another mission while you already have one. Complete it or abort it first.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Vous ne pouvez pas prendre une autre mission car il y a déjà une mission en cours. Terminée la ou abandonée la.
Key.German: Information:\n\n Es ist nicht möglich einen anderen Auftrag zu wählen wenn dir bereits einer zugeordnet ist. Erfülle diesen zuerst oder stoppe den laufenden Auftrag und wähle dann eine neue Stadt als Ziel aus.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Вы не можете выбрать другое задание, не завершив или не отменив текущее.
Key.Italian: Informazioni:\n\n Non puoi prendere un'altra missione se ne hai già un'altra, completala o abbandonala prima.

Key.German: Information:\n\n Der aktuelle Auftrag wurde abgebrochen.

Key.English: Information:\n\n You need at last one artillery in order to call a Fire Mission.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Au moins une unité d'artillerie est nécessaire pour utiliser un Appuie Feu.
Key.German:
Information:

 Du benötigst mindestens eine Artillerie-Einheit, um einen Feuerbefehl erteilen zu können.

 Wenn du schon eine besitzt, versichere dich, dass du diese auch ausgewählt hast.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Для вызова артиллерии у Вас должна быть хотя бы одна арт. установка.
Key.Italian: Informazioni:\n\n Hai bisogno di almeno un unità di artiglieria per chiamare il fuoco di soppressione.

Key.English: Information:\n\n An aerial unit has been called according to your order, it shall arrive here quite soon.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Une unité aérienne a été assigner sur votre demande, elle sera la sous peut.
Key.German: Information:\n\n Die angeforderten Fallschirmjäger sind auf dem Weg zur Absetzstelle.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n По вашему приказу вызван десантный ЛА, он скоро прибудет на место.
Key.Italian: Informazioni:\n\n Un unità aerea è stata assegnata su vostra richiesta, arriverà presto.

Key.English: Information:\n\n You can select a respawn location by clicking on the map Yellow Circle.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Il est possible de sélectionner un point de réapparation en cliquant sur les Cercles Jaunes de la carte.
Key.German: Information:\n\n Wähle deinen Respawnpunkt in dem du auf einen der gelben Kreise klickst.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Вы можете выбрать место возрождения, кликнув по желтому кругу на карте.
Key.Italian: Informazioni:\n\n Puoi selezionare un punto di riapparizione cliccando sui cerchi gialli nella mappa.

Key.English: Information:\n\n The MHQ is already being repaired.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Le PC est déjà en cours de réparation.
Key.German: Information:\n\n Das MHQ ist bereits repariert.
Key.Italian: Informazioni:\n\n The MHQ is already being repaired.

Key.English: Information:\n\n %1 %2 Needed in order to repair the MHQ.
Key.French: Information:\n\n %1 %2 Manquant afin de réparer le PC.
Key.German: Information:\n\n %1 %2 sind erforderlich um das MHQ zu reparieren.
Key.Italian: Informazioni:\n\n %1 %2 Needed in order to repair the MHQ.

Key.English: Information:\n\n There is no MHQ to repair around.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Il n'y a aucun PC à réparer a proximité.
Key.German:
Information:

 Es ist kein MHQ in der Nähe das repariert werden muss.

 Verichere dich, dass der Reparatur LKW nah genug am MHQ steht.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n There is no MHQ to repair around.
Key.Italian: Informazioni:\n\n There is no MHQ to repair around.

Key.English: Information:\n\n The MHQ is being fixed...
Key.French: Information:\n\n Le PC est en cours de réparation...
Key.Italian: Informazioni:\n\n The MHQ is being fixed...

Key.English: Information:\n\n A Supply truck of your team has delivered supplies at %1, the supply value is now %2/%3. $%4. Gained during the delivery.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Un Camion Logistique de votre équipe a livré de la logistique à %1, la valeur logistique est désormais de %2/%3. $%4. gagné lors de la livraison.
Key.German: Information:\n\n Ein Versorgungs LKW deines Teams hat Nachschub zu %1 geliefert, neuer Stand: %2/%3. Du hast $%4 für die Lieferung erhalten.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Грузовик снабжения доставил 1% единиц припасов. Объем припасов %2/%3. $%4 Получено во время доставки.
Key.Italian: Informazioni:\n\n Un Camion Supply del tuo Team ha consegnato a %1, il valore dei rifornimenti è ora %2/%3. $%4. Aumentati durante la consegna.

Key.English: Information:\n\n A Supply truck of your team has delivered supplies at %1, the supply value is %2/%3.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Un Camion Logistique de votre équipe a livré de la logistique à %1, la valeur logistique est de %2/%3.
Key.German: Information:\n\n Ein Versorgungs LKW deines Teams hat Nachschub zu %1 geliefert, neuer Stand: %2/%3.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Грузовик снабжения доставил %1 единиц припасов, Объем припасов %2/%3.
Key.Italian: Informazioni:\n\n Un Camion Supply del tuo Team ha consegnato a %1, il valore dei rifornimenti è ora %2/%3.

Key.English: Information:\n\n The Supply truck is fully loaded.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Le Camion Logistique est chargé au maximum.
Key.German: Information:\n\n Der Versorgungs LKW ist voll beladen.
Key.Italian: Informazioni:\n\n Il Camion Supply è completamente carico.

Key.English: Information:\n\n The Supply truck has %1 supplies in cargo.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Le Camion Logistique dispose de %1 logistique en chargement.
Key.German: Information:\n\n Der Versorgungs LKW hat %1 Einheiten geladen.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n В грузовик снабжения загружено %1 единиц поставки.
Key.Italian: Informazioni:\n\n Il Camion Supply ha caricato %1 Supply.

Key.English: Information:\n\n Spotting Ability require the use of binoculars.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Le Repérage requiert l'utilisation d'une paire de jumelle.
Key.German:
Information:

 Zum Beobachten wird ein Fernglas benötigt!

 Über das Ausrüstungsmenü kannst du dir ein Fernglas kaufen.
Key.Russian: Информация:\n\n Чтобы указать цель используйте бинокль.
Key.Italian: Informazioni:\n\n Hai bisogno del binocolo per Individuare.

Key.German: Information:\n\n Der Ausbau für %1 wurde gestartet.

Key.English:
Information:

You are currently missing $%1 in order to buy: %2.
Key.French:
Information:

Il vous manque $%1 pour acheter: %2.
Key.German:
Information:

Du hast nicht genug Geld!

Dir fehlen $%1 um %2 kaufen zu können.
Key.Russian:
Информация:

Не хватает $%1 для покупки: %2.
Key.Italian:
Informazioni:

Ti Mancano $%1 per comprare: %2.

Key.English:
Information:

You are currently missing $%1 in order to buy this loadout.
Key.French:
Information:

Il vous manque $%1 pour acheter cette configuration d'équipement.
Key.German:
Information:

Du hast nicht genug Geld!

Dir fehlen $%1 um dir deine Ausrüstung kaufen zu können.
Key.Russian:
Информация:

Не хватает $%1 для покупки снаряжения
Key.Italian:
Informazioni:

Ti Mancano $%1 per comprare questo equipaggiamento.

Key.English:
Information:

You may not transfer money to yourself.
Key.French:
Information:

Il est impossible de s'envoyer de l'argent à soi-même.
Key.German:
Information:

You may not transfer money to yourself.
Key.Russian:
Information:

You may not transfer money to yourself.
Key.Italian:
Information:

You may not transfer money to yourself.

Key.English:
Information:

$%1. were sent to %2.
Key.French:
Information:

$%1. ont été transférés à %2.
Key.German:
Information:

$%1. were sent to %2.
Key.Russian:
Information:

$%1. were sent to %2.
Key.Italian:
Information:

$%1. were sent to %2.

Key.English:
Information:

This weapon/loadout cannot be purchased due to your current loadout settings.

(The Realistic Gear parameter prevent the use of heavy primary weapons with launchers or backpacks).
Key.French:
Information:

Cette arme ou ensemble d'équipement ne peut être acheter en raison de votre équipement courant (Le paramètre Equipement réalistique empêche l'utilisation d'armement lourd avec des lance-missiles ou des sac à dos).
Key.German:
Information:

Diese Waffe bzw. diese Ausrüstungszusammenstellung kann nicht gekauft werden.

Der Parameter Realistische Ausrüstung verbietet die Verwendung von schweren Primärwaffen mit Raketenwerfern und/oder Rucksäcken.
Key.Russian:
Информация:

Это оружие/не может быть куплено из за настроек игры.

(The Реалистичное оружие параметр использования тяжелого оружия с гранатометами или рюкзаками).
Key.Italian:
Informazioni:

Questo tipo di equipaggiamento non può essere acquistato a causa delle impostazioni attuali sull'armamento.

(Il parametro Armamento Realistico impedisce l'uso di armi pesanti con lanciarazzi o zaini).

Key.English:
Information:

A %1 is being healed.

Please wait for %2 seconds during the healing...
Key.French:
Information:

Un %1 est en cours de soins.

Veuillez attendre %2 secondes durant les soins...
Key.German:
Information:

%1 wird behandelt.

Die Behandlung dauert %2 Sekunden...
Key.Russian:
Информация:

A %1 лечится.

Пожалуйста подождите %2 секунд для лечения...
Key.Italian:
Informazioni:

A %1 is being healed.

Please wait for %2 seconds during the healing...

Key.English:
Information:

A %1 has failed to be healed.
Key.French:
Information:

Un %1 n'a pas été soigner.
Key.German:
Information:

Die Behandlung des %1 ist fehlgeschlagen.
Key.Italian:
Informazioni:

A %1 has failed to be healed.

Key.English:
Information:

A %1 has been successfully healed.
Key.Italian:
Informazioni:

A %1 has been successfully healed.

Key.German:
Information:

Das Einheiten-Limit wurde erreicht

(max.%1 Einheiten).
Key.Russian:
Информация:

Достигнут лимит отряда (%1 человек).

Key.English:
Warning!

You are leaving the battlefield!

%1 Seconds left.
Key.French:
Attention!

Vous quittez le champs de bataille!

%1 Secondes restantes.
Key.German:
Warnung!

Du hast das Schlachtfeld verlassen!

Du hast %1 Sekunden Zeit, um auf das Schlachtfeld zurückzukehren.
Key.Russian:
Warning!

Вы покинули поле битвы!Осталось

%1 секунд до наказания.
Key.Italian:
Warning!

Stai lasciando il campo di battaglia!

%1 Secondi rimasti.

Key.German:
Information:

Dein %1 befindet sich in der Warteschlange.

Key.English:
Information:

The maximal queue has been reached for this factory (%1), please be patient.
Key.French:
Information:

La file d'attente maximale à été atteinte pour cette usine (%1), veuillez patienter.
Key.German:
Information:

Diese Fabrik hat das Limit für die Warteschlange erreicht (%1), könnte also ein wenig dauern.
Key.Russian:
Информация:

очередь завода достигла максимума (%1), пожалуйста подождите.
Key.Italian:
Informazioni:

The maximal queue has been reached for this factory (%1), please be patient.

Key.English:
Information:

A %1 is being rearmed.

Please wait for %2 seconds during the rearm process...
Key.French:
Information:

Un %1 est en cours de réarmement.

Veuillez attendre %2 secondes durant la phase de réarmement...
Key.German:
Information:

%1 wird aufmunitioniert.

Das Aufmunitionieren dauert %2 Sekunden...
Key.Russian:
Информация:

%1 перевооружается.

Ждите %2 секунд для перезарядки...
Key.Italian:
Informazioni:

A %1 riarmo in corso.

Please wait for %2 seconds during the rearm process...

Key.English:
Information:

A %1 has failed to be rearmed.
Key.French:
Information:

Un %1 n'a pas été réarmé.
Key.German:
Information:

Das Aufmunitionieren von %1 ist fehlgeschlagen.

Key.English:
Information:

A %1 is being refueled.

Please wait for %2 seconds during the refuel process...
Key.French:
Information:

Un %1 est en cours de ravitaillement.

Veuillez attendre %2 secondes durant la phase de ravitaillement...
Key.German:
Information:

%1 wird aufgetankt.

Die Betankung dauert %2 Sekunden...
Key.Russian:
Информация:

%1 заправляется.

Пожалуйста ждите %2 секунд для заправки...
Key.Italian:
Informazioni:

A %1 rifornimento in corso.

Please wait for %2 seconds during the refuel process...

Key.English:
Information:

A %1 has failed to be refueled.
Key.French:
Information:

Un %1 n'a pas été ravitaillé.
Key.German:
Information:

Die Betankung von %1 ist fehlgeschlagen.

Information:

Die Betankung von %1 wurde erfolgreich abgeschlossen.

Key.English:
Information:

A %1 is being repaired.

Please wait for %2 seconds during the reparations...
Key.French:
Information:

Un %1 est en cours de réparation.

Veuillez attendre %2 secondes durant les réparations...
Key.German:
Information:

%1 wird repariert.

Die Reparatur dauert %2 Sekunden...
Key.Russian:
Информация:

%1 ремонтируется.

Ждите %2 секунд для починки...
Key.Italian:
Informazioni:

A %1 riparazione in corso.

Please wait for %2 secondi al termine della riparazione...

Key.English:
Information:

A %1 has failed to be repaired.
Key.French:
Information:

Un %1 n'a pas été reparé.
Key.German:
Information:

Die Reparatur von %1 ist fehlgeschlagen.

Key.English:
Information:

A %1 has been successfully repaired.
Key.German:
Information:

Die Reparatur von %1 wurde erfolgreich abgeschlossen.
Key.Italian:
Informazioni:

A %1 è stato completamente riparato

Key.Russian: Время работы: %1 день, %2 часов, %3 минут, %4 секунд

Key.English:
One of our scout team has reported us that multiple resistance squads are heading toward our base.

According to the report, theirs arrival is imminent, we will have to defend the base at all cost, HQ has ordered us to neutralize the threat even if the base is lost.
Key.French:
Une de nos équipes de reconnaissance nous a informé de l'arrivé de plusieurs escouades resistantes vers notre base.

D'après le rapport officiel, leurs arrivées est imminente. Nous allons devoir défendre la base à tout prix, le QG nous a ordonné de neutraliser cette menace même si la base est perdue.
Key.German:
Eine unserer Aufklärungseinheit hat soeben berichtet, dass mehrere Einheiten des Widerstand, auf unser Hauptquartier zumaschieren.

Dem Bericht zufolge, steht ihre Ankunft und ein damit verbundener Angriff unmittelbar bevor. Das Hauptquartier muss unter allen Umständen verteidigt und die Aggressoren eliminiert werden, koste es was es wolle.
Key.Russian:
Одна из наших разведкоманд сообщает о многочисленных отрядах сопротивления приближающихся к нашей базе.

Из их доклада следует что нападение неизбежно, мы должны защитить базу любой ценой, штаб приказал нейтрализовать угрозу даже если база уничтожена.
Key.Italian:
One of our scout team has reported us that multiple resistance squads are heading toward our base.

According to the report, theirs arrival is imminent, we will have to defend the base at all cost, HQ has ordered us to neutralize the threat even if the base is lost.

Key.English:
HQ warned us about an incomming mercenary helicopter hunting down our Squadleaders.

Your mission is to locate and destroy that helicopter.
Key.French:
Le QG nous à alerté de l'arrivée d'un hélicoptère mercenaire chassant nos chefs d'équipes.

Votre mission est de trouver et détruire cette hélicoptère.
Key.German:
Das Hauptquartier warnt vor einem feindlichen Hubschrauber, der Jagd auf unsere Squadleader macht.

Die Mission ist es, den Hubschrauber zu lokalisieren und zu zerstören.
Key.Russian:
Штаб уведомил нас о приближающемся вертолете наемников,охотящимся на командиров отделений.

Ваша задача - обнаружить и уничтожить вертолет.
Key.Italian:
HQ warned us about an incomming mercenary helicopter hunting down our Squadleaders.

Your mission is to locate and destroy that helicopter.

Key.English:
Our intels has informed us that a resistance commander is planning an attack on %1.

The attack will be launched soon, make sure to defend that town at all cost.

A Search and Destroy mission will be necessary to complete %1 defense.
Key.French:
Nos renseignements nous indique qu'un commandant resistant plannifie d'attaquer %1.

L'attaque doit avoir lieu bientôt, assurez-vous de défendre cette ville à tout prix.

Une mission de Recherche et Destruction sera nécessaire finaliser la défense de %1.
Key.German:
Unser Geheimdienst hat Informationen, dass der Commander des Widerstands einen Angriff auf %1.

plant. Der Angriff wird voraussichtlich in Kürze stattfinden. Verteidige die Stadt unter allen Umständen.

Eine Search and Destroy Mission wird notwendig sein, um die Verteidigung von %1 sicherzustellen.
Key.Russian:
Наша разведка сообщила нам, что командующий силами сопротивления планирует нападение на %1.

Наступление начнется скоро, будте уверены, этот город должен быть защищен любой ценой.

Необходимо найти и уничтожить силы сопротивления %1 defense.
Key.Italian:
La nostra Inteligence ci ha informato che commando della resistenza sta pianificando un attacco a %1.

L'attacco verra lanciato preso, assicurati di difentere questa città a tutti i costi.

Una missione di ricerca e distruzione sarà necessaria per completare la difesa di %1.

Key.English:
From what we've learned from our intels, an UAV has been shot down in this area, retrieving it's module is essential for our team as it contains critical intel about enemy forces.

Once that your team has secured the crash site, we will send a team to retrieve the module, make sure to protect them.
Key.French:
D'après ce que nos renseignements nous ont appris, un Drone a été abattu dans cette zone, il est essentiel de recupérer son module en raison d'importants renseignements qu'il contient sur les forces enemies.

Une fois le site du crash sécurisé, nous enverrons une équipe récuperer le module, assurez-vous de les protéger.
Key.German:
Von dem was wir von unserem Geheimdienst wissen, wurde in dieser Gegend ein UAV abgeschossen. Das UAV hat im Laufe seines Einsatzes sehr wichtige Informationen über die feindlichen Streitkräfte sammeln können, die für uns von strategischer Wichtigkeit sind. Deshalb hat die Bergung des Moduls oberste Priorität.

Sobald die Absturzstelle gesichert wurde, werden wir einen Bergungstrupp aussenden, um das Modul zu bergen. Sichere die Absturzstelle, bis die Bergung abgeschlossen ist!
Key.Russian:
По данным нашей разведки БЛА был сбит в этом районе, нужно вернуть модуль БЛА так как он важен для нашей команды, поскольку содержит критически важные сведения о вражеских силах,

Как только Ваша команда обнаружит место крушения, мы пошлем команду, чтобы извлечь модуль, позаботьтесь об их защите.
Key.Italian:
Da quello che abbiamo appreso dalla nostra Inteligence, un UAV è stato abbattuto in questa area, recuperare il suo modulo è essenziale per noi perchè contiene informazioni critiche sulle forze nemiche

Una volta assicurata la zona dove è caduto, manderemo un team a recuperare il modulo, assicurati di proteggerlo.

Key.French: IA: Maintien des unités durant JIP

Key.German: BASE: Alliierte Basis bei Spielstart für

Key.French: BASE: Rayon de Deploiement du QG

Key.German: BASE: Distanz zum anderen Team bei Spielstart

Key.French: JOUABILITÉ: Délai de Suppression des Corps
Key.German: SPIEL: Dauer für tote Spieler & zerst. Fahrzeuge

Key.French: JOUABILITÉ: Durée de Vie des Véhicules Vide
Key.Italian: Gameplay: Tempo di rimozione Veicoli Vuoti

Key.French: JOUABILITÉ: Limitation de la distance des Missiles.

Key.English: GAMEPLAY: Track AI on Map (yellow dots)
Key.French: JOUABILITÉ: Affichage IA sur Carte (yellow dots)
Key.German: SPIEL: KI auf der Karte anzeigen (gelbe Punkte)
Key.Russian: Геймплей: Показывать ИИ на карте (yellow dots)
Key.Italian: Gameplay: Segna IA sulla Mappa (yellow dots)

Key.German: SPIEL: Spieler auf der Karte anzeigen
STÄDTE: Kauf von Infanterie möglich wenn erobert

Key.French: Salaire Commandant - Système de Salaire Complet
Prix Equipement lors de Réapparition Mobile

Key.English: An Artillery Minimap display fitler has been toggled
Key.French: Un filtre d'affichage de l'artillerie sur la carte à été activer
Key.German: Der Grafikfilter für die Artillerie-Karte wurde geändert
Key.Russian: Режим фильтра на артиллерийском дисплее был сменен
Key.Italian: An Artillery Minimap display fitler has been toggled

Key.English: Click on the map to activate the selected action
Key.French: Cliquer sur la carte pour activer l'action séléctionnée.
Key.German: Klick auf die Karte um die gewünschte Aktion auszuführen
Key.Russian: Click on the map to activate the selected action
Key.Italian: Click on the map to activate the selected action

Key.English: This icon allows you to toggle between the different artillery display mode on the map
Key.French: Cet icône vous permet de changer le mode d'affichage de l'artillerie sur la carte
Key.German: Hier kannst du den Grafikfilter der Artillerie-Karte ändern
Key.Russian: Эта кнопка позволит вам переключать различные режимы отображения артиллерии на карте
Key.Italian: This icon allows you to toggle between the different artillery display mode on the map

Key.French: Equipement: Management de Sac à dos (Requiert un sac)

Key.English: Allows the commander to handle Squads, Squadmember and Special Tasks
Key.French: permet au commandant de gérer les Equipes et leur membres ainsi que les Tâches Spécifiques
Key.German: Als Commander kannst du die Squads, Squadmitglieder und Spezialaufträge verwalten
Key.Russian: Allows the commander to handle Squads, Squadmember and Special Tasks
Key.Italian: Allows the commander to handle Squads, Squadmember and Special Tasks

Key.English: Allows the commander to handle the income distribution and HQ-workers
Key.French: Permet au commandant de gérer les revenues et les travailleurs.
Key.German: Als Commander kannst du die Einkommensverteilung und HQ-Arbeiter verwalten
Key.Russian: Allows the commander to handle the income distribution and HQ-workers
Key.Italian: Allows the commander to handle the income distribution and HQ-workers

Key.English: Artillery, Ammo/Vehicle-drop, Paratroop, UnitCam, FastTravel, UAV and ICBM
Key.French: Artillerie, Parachutage de Munitions/Véhicule, Parachutistes, Caméra d'unité, Déplacement Rapide, Drone et MBI
Key.German: Artillerie, Munition/Fahrzeug-Abwurf, Fallschirmjäger, Einheitenkamera, Schnelles-Reisen, UAV und ICBM
Key.Russian: Artillery, Ammo/Vehicle-drop, Paratroop, UnitCam, FastTravel, UAV and ICBM
Key.Italian: Artillery, Ammo/Vehicle-drop, Paratroop, UnitCam, FastTravel, UAV and ICBM

Key.English: Rearm, Refuel, Repair, Heal and EASA
Key.French: Munitions, Essence, Réparation et Soins sont disponible ainsi que la liste des Paramètres et le Module EASA
Key.German: Aufmunitionieren, Auftanken, Reparaturen, Verwundete heilen und Bewaffnungssystem (EASA)
Key.Russian: Rearm, Refuel, Repair, Heal and EASA
Key.Italian: Rearm, Refuel, Repair, Heal and EASA

Key.English: Allows the commander to handle the factory enhancements
Key.French: En tant que commandant, il est possible de réaliser diverses améliorations
Key.German: Als Commander kannst du den Fabrikausbau verwalten
Key.Russian: Allows the commander to handle the factory expansion
Key.Italian: Allows the commander to handle the factory expansion

Key.French: Lance-missiles, Sac à dos, Désignateur laser, tout y est!

Key.English: Weapon, Ammonition, Backpacks, Bags and Misc

Key.Italian: Weapon, Ammonition, Backpacks, Bags and Misc

Key.English: Distance View/Details, Money Transfer and KI-Member

Key.Italian: Distance View/Details, Money Transfer and KI-Member

Key.French: Vote pour l'éléction d'un nouveau commandant

Key.French: Intervetir entre le kit par défaut et le kit courrant
Key.German: Auswahl zwischen Standardausrüstung und aktueller Ausrüstung

Key.Italian: Toggle between the default and current gear

Key.English: Respawn stucked Supply Trucks. ATTENTION => ALL Trucks will be destroyed!
Key.French: Réapparition des camions de ravitaillement. ATTENTION => tous les camions seront détruit!
Key.German: Respawn der feststeckenden Versorgungs-LKW`s. ACHTUNG => ALLE LKW`s werden dabei zerstört!
Key.Russian: Respawn stucked Supply Trucks. ATTENTION => ALL Trucks will be destroyed!
Key.Italian: Respawn stucked Supply Trucks. ATTENTION => ALL Trucks will be destroyed!

Key.English: Purchase light Vehicles (Hmmwv, Truck, Motorcycle, Bike, Boat ect.)
Key.French: Achat de véhicules légers (Hmmwv, Camions, Moto, Vélo, Bateaux ect.)
Key.German: Leichte Fahrzeuge kaufen (Jeeps, LKWs, Motorräder, Fahrräder, Boote usw.)

Key.French: Achat de véhicules lourd (Tanks, Artilleries ect.)

Key.English: Buy Units on a conquered Depot
Key.Russian: Buy Units on a conquered Depot
Key.Italian: Buy Units on a conquered Depot

Key.French: Une Amélioration est déjà en cours
Key.Italian: Un Aggiornamento è già in corso

Key.English: This upgrade requires a parameter to be enabled
Key.French: Cette Amélioration nécessite l'activation d'un paramètre
Key.German: Dieses Upgrade wurde per Parameter deaktiviert
Key.Russian: Эта модернизация должна быть разрешена в настройках миссии
Key.Italian: Questo aggiornamento ha bisogno di essere abilitato

Key.English: This upgrade requires the %1 upgrade at level %2
Key.French: Cette amélioration requiert que l'amélioration %1 soit au niveau %2
Key.German: Für diese Upgrade muss %1 die Stufe %2 erreicht haben
Key.Italian: Questo aggiornamento richiede l'aggiornamento %1 al livello %2

Key.English:
Allows the use of better infantry units.

Each level will improve the units choice in the barracks.
Key.French:
Autorise l'utilisation de meilleurs unités d'infantrie.

Chaque niveau améliore le choix d'unités dans les casernes.
Key.German:
Allows the use of better infantry units.

Each level will improve the units choice in the barracks.
Key.Russian:
Allows the use of better infantry units.

Each level will improve the units choice in the barracks.
Key.Italian:
Allows the use of better infantry units.

Each level will improve the units choice in the barracks.

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks Fast Travel.

Allows the use of Fast Traveling from the Tactical Center.
Key.French:
Débloque le déplacement rapide.

Autorise le déplacement rapide via le Centre Tactique.
Key.German:
Dieses Upgrade schaltet Schnelles Reisen frei.

Damit kann das Team über das Tactical Center, Schnelles Reisen anfordern.
Key.Russian:
This upgrade unlocks Fast Travel.

Allows the use of Fast Traveling from the Tactical Center.
Key.Italian:
This upgrade unlocks Fast Travel.

Allows the use of Fast Traveling from the Tactical Center.

Key.English:
Upgrade the Weapons and Magazines loadouts.

The team may purchase better equipment in the Gear Menu.
Key.French:
Améliore l'armement ainsi que les munitions.

L'Equipe peut acheter de meilleurs équipements au travers du menu d'équipement.
Key.German:
Upgrade the Weapons and Magazines loadouts.

The team may purchase better equipment in the Gear Menu.

Upgrade the Weapons and Magazines loadouts.

The team may purchase better equipment in the Gear Menu.

Upgrade the Weapons and Magazines loadouts.

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks ammo and ordinance crates.

Ammo and Weapons crates may be placed from the Construction Menu.
Key.French:
Débloque le placement de caisses d'armements.

Des caisses de munitions et d'armements peuvent être placées via le Menu de Construction.

This upgrade unlocks ammo and ordinance crates.

Ammo and Weapons crates may be placed from the Construction Menu.

Decrease the Fire Mission cooldown timer of artillery.

%1

Diminue le temps d'attente du soutien d'artillery.

%1

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks new ammunition for artillery pieces.

This allows the artillery-units to fire improved ammunition such as LASER, WP, SADARM, ILLUM.
Key.French:
Débloque l'accès à de nouvelles munitions pour les pièces d'artilleries.

De nouvelles munitions peuvent être tirées par les pièces d'artilleries comme LASER, WP, SADARM, ILLUM.

This allows the artillery-units to fire improved ammunition such as LASER, WP, SADARM, ILLUM.

Each level will improve the units choice in the air vehicle factory.
Key.French:
Autorise l'utilisation de meilleurs véhicules lourds.

Chaque niveau améliore le choix d'unités dans les usines d'aréonefs.

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks airlifting.

Airlift may be used to lift vehicles by the air.
Key.French: Cette amélioration débloque le transport de véhicules par les airs.
Key.German:
This upgrade unlocks airlifting.

Airlift may be used to lift vehicles by the air.
Key.Russian:
This upgrade unlocks airlifting.

Airlift may be used to lift vehicles by the air.
Key.Italian:
This upgrade unlocks airlifting.

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks supply paradrop.

Vehicle or Ammo paradrop may be called from the Tactical Center.
Key.French:
Débloque l'appel de soutien logistique aérien.

Un véhicule ou des munitions peuvent être parachutées au travers du Centre Tactique.
Key.German:
This upgrade unlocks supply paradrop.

Vehicle or Ammo paradrop may be called from the Tactical Center.

This upgrade unlocks supply paradrop.

Vehicle or Ammo paradrop may be called from the Tactical Center.
Key.Italian:
This upgrade unlocks supply paradrop.

Vehicle or Ammo paradrop may be called from the Tactical Center.

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks paratroopers.

Calls a %1 with infantry in cargo, the amount of infantry in cargo is based on the upgrade level:

%2
Key.French:
Cette amélioration débloque les parachutistes.

Apple un %1 avec de l'infantrie en cargo, le nombre d'unités est basé sur le niveau d'amélioration:

%2
Key.German:
This upgrade unlocks paratroopers.

Calls a %1 with infantry in cargo, the amount of infantry in cargo is based on the upgrade level:

%2
Key.Russian:
This upgrade unlocks paratroopers.

Calls a %1 with infantry in cargo, the amount of infantry in cargo is based on the upgrade level:

%2

This upgrade unlocks paratroopers.

%2

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks UAV.

This allows the team to buy a UAV from the Tactical Center.
Key.French:
Cette amélioration permet l'utilisation de drones.

Un drone peut être acheté à partir du Centre Tactique.
Key.German:
Dieses Upgrade schaltet das UAV frei.

Dadurch kann das Team über das Tactical Center, UAV-unterstützung anfordern.
Key.Russian:
This upgrade unlocks UAV.

This allows the team to buy a UAV from the Tactical Center.
Key.Italian:
This upgrade unlocks UAV.

This allows the team to buy a UAV from the Tactical Center.

Key.English:
Unlock the use of countermeasures on aircraft.

This allows the use of defensive countermeasures (flares) on aircraft.
Key.French:
Débloque l'utilisation de Contre-mesures.

Des contre-mesures de défenses sont installés sur les aeronefs.
Key.German:
Unlock the use of countermeasures on aircraft.

This allows the use of defensive countermeasures (flares) on aircraft.
Key.Russian:
Unlock the use of countermeasures on aircraft.

This allows the use of defensive countermeasures (flares) on aircraft.
Key.Italian:
Unlock the use of countermeasures on aircraft.

This allows the use of defensive countermeasures (flares) on aircraft.

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks ICBM.

The commander can purchase ICBM from the Tactical Center menu.
Key.French:
Débloque l'utilisation de MIB.

Le commandant peut appeller un MIB via le Centre Tactique.
Key.German:
This upgrade unlocks ICBM.

The commander can purchase ICBM from the Tactical Center menu.
Key.Russian:
This upgrade unlocks ICBM.

The commander can purchase ICBM from the Tactical Center menu.
Key.Italian:
This upgrade unlocks ICBM.

The commander can purchase ICBM from the Tactical Center menu.

Key.English:
This upgrade unlocks EASA.

EASA may be used to change the loadout of aircraft.
- Bomb
- AT Guided Missile
- AA Guided Missile
Key.French:
Cette amélioration débloque l'utilisation de l'EASA.

EASA peut être utilisé pour changé l'armement des aéronefs.
- Bombes
- Missiles Anti-Tank
- Missiles Anti-Aériens
Key.German:
This upgrade unlocks EASA.

EASA may be used to change the loadout of aircraft.
- Bomb
- AT Guided Missile
- AA Guided Missile

- AA Guided Missile

- AT Guided Missile
- AA Guided Missile

Key.English:
The IR smoke improve the current smoke deployment system.

All vehicles equiped with this system have a chance to dodge IR Locked projectile as long as they remain in the deployed smoke.
Key.French:
L'écran de fumée IR améliore les véhicules disposant d'un système de déploiement de fumée standard.

Tout véhicules équipés de ce système ont une chance d'éviter les projectiles IR tant qu'ils restent concis dans l'écran de fumée.
Key.German:
The IR smoke improve the current smoke deployment system.

All vehicles equiped with this system have a chance to dodge IR Locked projectile as long as they remain in the deployed smoke.
Key.Russian:
The IR smoke improve the current smoke deployment system.

All vehicles equiped with this system have a chance to dodge IR Locked projectile as long as they remain in the deployed smoke.
Key.Italian:
The IR smoke improve the current smoke deployment system.

All vehicles equiped with this system have a chance to dodge IR Locked projectile as long as they remain in the deployed smoke.

Key.English: Information:\n\n The camp is already repaired.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Le camp est déjà réparé.
Key.German: Information:\n\n The camp is already repaired.
Key.Russian: Information:\n\n The camp is already repaired.
Key.Italian: Information:\n\n The camp is already repaired.

Key.English: Information:\n\n The camp is being repaired.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Le camp est en cours de réparation.
Key.German: Information:\n\n The camp is being repaired.
Key.Russian: Information:\n\n The camp is being repaired.
Key.Italian: Information:\n\n The camp is being repaired.

Key.English: Information:\n\n There is no nearby camps which can be repaired.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Aucun camp à proximité ne peut être réparé.
Key.German: Information:\n\n There is no nearby camps which can be repaired.
Key.Russian: Information:\n\n There is no nearby camps which can be repaired.
Key.Italian: Information:\n\n There is no nearby camps which can be repaired.

Key.English: Information:\n\n You are currently missing $%1. in order to repair a camp.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Il vous manque actuellement $%1. afin de réparer le camp.
Key.German: Information:\n\n You are currently missing $%1. in order to repair a camp.
Key.Russian: Information:\n\n You are currently missing $%1. in order to repair a camp.
Key.Italian: Information:\n\n You are currently missing $%1. in order to repair a camp.

Key.English: Information:\n\n None of the nearby camps are destroyed.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Aucun camp à proximité n'est détruit.
Key.German: Information:\n\n None of the nearby camps are destroyed.
Key.Russian: Information:\n\n None of the nearby camps are destroyed.
Key.Italian: Information:\n\n None of the nearby camps are destroyed.

Key.English: Information:\n\n The repair truck is either too far or destroyed.
Key.French: Information:\n\n Le camion de réparation est trop loin de la cible ou à été détruit.
Key.German: Information:\n\n The repair truck is either too far or destroyed.
Key.Russian: Information:\n\n The repair truck is either too far or destroyed.
Key.Italian: Information:\n\n The repair truck is either too far or destroyed.

Key.English: Capturing %1 is essential to our team, neutralizing %1 Depot will ensure it's capture.
Key.French: Capturer %1 est éssentiel à notre équipe, neutraliser le Dépot de %1 pour procéder à la capture.
Key.German:
Die Ortschaft %1 zu erobern, ist für unser Team von großer Wichtigkeit!
Neutralisiere den Feind und besetze das zentrale Depot, um somit die Stadt einzunehmen.
Key.Russian: Захват %1 имеет большое значение для нас. Захватите бункер в центре для захвата города.
Key.Italian: Conquistare %1 è fondamentale per il nostro Team, neutralizza il deposito di %1 per catturarlo.

Key.English: <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker> has been captured by our team, Defending <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker> Depot and Camps might be necessary to prevent enemies from taking it.
Key.French: Notre équipe à capturé <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker>, la défense du Dépot de <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker> et de ses Camps sera peut être nécessaire pour empêcher l'énemie de s'en emparer.
Key.German:
Die Ortschaft %1 wurde von unserem Team eingenommen.
Um sie zu halten, müssen das Depot und die Camps von %1 unter allen Umständen verteidigt werden. Der Feind darf keine Chance bekommen, den Ort zurückzuerobern!
Key.Russian: <цель='%1Depot'>%1<marker> было захвачено вашей командой, Защитите <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker> контролировать склад и лагеря необходимо для контроля города.
Key.Italian: <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker> è stato catturata dal tuo team, difendere <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker> Depositi e Campi è essere necessario per evitare che vengano catturati dai nemici.
